General.Name: CEA Industries Inc
General.Description: CEA Industries Inc., through its subsidiary, Surna Cultivation Technologies LLC, focuses on selling environmental control and other technologies and services to the controlled environment agriculture (CEA) industry. It offers architectural design and licensed engineering of commercial scale thermodynamic systems specific to cultivation facilities; liquid-based process cooling systems and other climate control systems; and air handling equipment and systems. The company also provides air sanitation products; LED lighting; benching and racking solutions for indoor cultivation; controls systems and technologies for environmental, lighting, and climate control; and preventative maintenance services for CEA facilities. In addition, it offers a range of service solutions that include facility design and budgeting, equipment selection and specification, and equipment installation advisory. The company is headquartered in Louisville, Colorado.
General.Address: 385 South Pierce Avenue, Louisville, CO, United States, 80027
